metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1262 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cgi-bin/mt/mt-wizard.cgi in Movable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13, when the product is incompletely installed, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the dbuser parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-0318.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
